title: Serene Ubud Pool Villa Jungle Retreat with Massages, Daily Breakfasts & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Between the gentle murmuring of the Petanu river and Ubud’s jungle hinterland lies Tejaprana Resort & Spa, a serene oasis just minutes from Bali’s spiritual city centre. Masterfully designed in accordance with traditional Balinese taksu, or spiritual energy, each of the resort's private villas offers a luxurious private infinity plunge pool and views of the magnificent jungle surrounds. Savour Ubud at its most extraordinary - begin each morning as the sun breaks above emerald treetops, savour authentic nasi goreng and satay at Aruna Restaurant or indulge in holistic wellness treatments at the onsite spa.

Tejaprana Resort & Spa is the perfect base to explore Bali’s cultural heart - visit sacred temples with simian friends at the Ubud Monkey Forest, discover one of Bali’s most impressive galleries with a visit to the Agung Rai Museum of Art or wander through Tegallalang's iconic rice terraces.
